description: This is the most basic type.

basic.description: Basic types don't have system:object added by default to the embedded types.

embed.description: Types which this should embed - system:object is always added unless basic = true.

native.description: This is the native json type that represents this type. If omitted, default is object.

custom.description: Custom types are not emitted into the generated source

custom-kind.description: The kind of the type if custom is specified - must be value, struct, collection or interface

alias.description: If this type is an alias of another type, specify the underlying type here

fields.description: Each field is listed with it's type

rule.description: Type that defines restriction rules for this type.
